column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I had heard a lot of people say that the portions were huge
column2: but I finished my bowl with ease. I would have probably liked a larger bowl
column3: but I have lived my entire life in Texas
column4: so .. take what I say with a grain of salt. Also
column5: I can't complain about portion size with prices as low as they are at JINYA. I will definitely be back - the HOT ramen with the cold
column6: refreshing sake was an outstanding combination.
